x x x x+x+x x x x x x x x an x+x x x x x x iqabbûniššu x+x x x x mār Mukin-zeri x x x x x x ina Hagranu x x u ṣābāni x+x+x x x x x issu libbi Hamete x+x x+x x x ittūṣiu ina pānīya ittalkūni ahturup attalak nišē annūti ša šaglûni ina Barsip x x x+x x+x x x x x x x x x x+x ši x+x x+x+x x x x x x ka x+x x+x x+x x x gabbu ussagli šarru lū ūdi Elamaya ṣābānišunu issi mār Mukin-zeri lā iddūku u ša-daʾāni ussaglišunu šunūma igdalû ṭēmu o ša Liʾtamu o Gaʾamanu mār x x x ša ina libbi ahhēšu x x issi mār šipri ša {1}x x x x x+x x+x x x x x
